sentences.english: On my first day of school, I didn't speak a word of English.
sentences.chinese: 当我第一天上学时，我连一个英文单词都说不出口。

sentences.english: He (was selected ) the monitor when he was at school.
sentences.chinese: 他在上学时被选为班长。

sentences.english: Susannah won the calligraphy prize when she was at school.
sentences.chinese: 苏珊娜上学时赢得了书法奖。

sentences.english: In the ages of Big Science, any science research cannot be done without collaboration.
sentences.chinese: 在当今大科学时代，任何科学研究都离不开科研合作。

sentences.english: When in school, they spend their parnets'money without any execuse.
sentences.chinese: 上学时心安理得地花着家里的钱。

sentences.english: Helli: What was the worst trouble you ever got into at school?
sentences.chinese: 你上学时犯过最大的错误是什么呢？

sentences.english: Cheat in your education, and your income suffers.
sentences.chinese: 在上学时弄虚作假，你的收入就会受害。

sentences.english: Susannah won the calligraphy prize when she was at school.
sentences.chinese: 珊娜上学时赢得了书法奖。

sentences.english: Stealing from a teacher led to his expulsive from high school.
sentences.chinese: 因为向老师行窃，导致他在上学时被退学。

sentences.english: She catches up on sleep when commuting.
What about the cost of room and board while attending school?
sentences.chinese: 那么怎么看上学时的住宿和膳食费用呢？

sentences.english: The author suggests increasing English class hours for the new-comers and teaching by classifying them into different bands.
sentences.chinese: 建议增加一年级英语学时，并开展分级教学。

sentences.english: On my first day of school, I didn’t speak a word of English.
sentences.chinese: 我第一天上学时，连一个英文单词都不会说。

sentences.english: And there is another consideration. Schools may need a lot of extra money to pay for an extended day.
sentences.chinese: 还有一种考虑认为学校应该对延长的学时收费。

sentences.english: Such doubt sees the light of a post-scientific era.
sentences.chinese: 这种怀疑，使我们看到了后科学时代的曙光。

sentences.english: A brief history of the Society of Scientific Age is narrated in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文叙述了科学时代社的简史。

definition: credit system/grading system (in schools, universities etc)

general course/general education course/core course/general curriculum/general education curriculum/core curriculum
school begins/give a course/teach a subject
student/member of an institution of learning/officer cadet
to give classes/to work as a teacher
